website_summaries.verdict: This little Woodstock plush toys is a well-made and proportionately sized companion for a larger Snoopy plushie.
pros: Beans in Woodstock’s bottom make him easy to sit upright
cons: A little pricy for such a small plushie

customer_reviews.title: Well made, arrived quickly, made a child very happy!
customer_reviews.text: My child had been wanting a tiny Woodstock to go with his snoopy dog he carries around. Most of the other ones I found were the same size as snoopy and to a very detail oriented boy they were not “right”. This one is proportional to his snoopy dog, arrived earlier than expected, and made for a very happy boy. We also learned about Japan, where the toy was shipping from, and constantly talked for weeks about the trip his new friend was making across the world. It was definitely a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Tiny but great quality
customer_reviews.text: My little chihuahua loves it. There is no squeaker in it. It is to replace one I got at petsmart during the holidays and I cannot find it now. He is very happy and I even received many kisses. I most likely will order again in the future as he pulls out Woodstock’s hair, ouch. It’s a tad pricy but it’s okay because my guy loves it and I love him.
customer_reviews.author: annalise

customer_reviews.title: Yeah- kinda goofy but we like it!
customer_reviews.text: Hot glued to the top of our Morkie's little- think the Peanut's "Woodstock". Right over the doorway. Yeah- kinda goofy but we like it!
customer_reviews.author: Vagabond Steve

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This little stuffed animal is adorable! Got it for a costume for our toddler and it’s perfect. Lots of comments that its too small for the cost, which is fair, but the detail and quality are worth it for me. It is small, I could likely hide it in my hand - see photo.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in size for this price. I’d expect it to be at least normal stuffed animal size for $13!
customer_reviews.author: JMorgan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter saw a picture if Woodstock and asked for one. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Schoch

customer_reviews.title: Cute and quality
customer_reviews.text: My son was super happy. He has a keen eye, and determined that this one looks the most like the 'real' Woodstock!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Woodstock and Dexter!
customer_reviews.text: My younger Basset Hound had two back surgeries this summer and along with acupuncture he'd get laser treatments and had to wear goggles. Woodstock goes with him. Everyone loves to see both of them.
customer_reviews.author: J. Penney

customer_reviews.title: Woodstock minus the pot and nudity
customer_reviews.text: Best part of peanuts. Little yellow bird is awesome and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Brienne

customer_reviews.title: ... little girl to go with her snoopy it’s a great addition to her stuffy collection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my little girl to go with her snoopy it’s a great addition to her stuffy collection. The quality is good and it seems to be holding up well against a five-year-old
customer_reviews.author: SpecialEB

customer_reviews.title: Got a Snoppy? you need this
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect it to show up before Christmas when we gave our son his Snoopy, but when it did show up in the mail he was super excited!! obviously they make the perfect pair
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a companion for my sons Snoopy stuffed animal and this was the perfect character. He is the size Woodstock should be. A bigger one wouldn’t do. He’s supposed to be small. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Collins

customer_reviews.title: This thing was a LOT smaller than I thought. ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a LOT smaller than I thought... I may not have read carefully enough, but a photo for scale would really help. I wanted a larger stuffed animal and I guess just assumed this was one based on the price, which I feel is too much for a 4-inch tall stuffed animal.
customer_reviews.author: JE12

customer_reviews.title: Small but cute!!!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute and nice quality. Kinda small (about 4 inches) but super soft.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cat is obsessed with this toy. Can’t even get her this excited about other yellow toys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than photo
customer_reviews.text: I love Woodstock. I purchased him for my Snoopy to sit on his shoulder. In a way he is perfect size for that. I was hoping a little bigger. Better looking than other Woodstock's for sale. He should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Home Savvy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Blast from the past ! Good quality and the perfect aspect ration for the snoopy I ordered as well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Johnson

product_meta.title: PEANUTS beanbags stuffed Woodstock by Sekiguchi
product_meta.description: Beanbag stuffed best friend Woodstock appeared Snoopy. It is also good to enjoy in the interior decorate your room ?

Woodstock is a bird who quickly became Snoopyfs best friend
